snippet: Italy survived scares in both its singles rubbers Friday to take a 2-0 lead in its Davis Cup first-round tie against a Switzerland team missing Roger Federer and Stan Wawrinka....
lead_paragraph: Italy survived scares in both its singles rubbers Friday to take a 2-0 lead in its Davis Cup first-round tie against a Switzerland team missing Roger Federer and Stan Wawrinka.

headline.print_headline: Davis Cup: Italy Survives Scares to Lead Switzerland 2-0
headline.main: Davis Cup: Italy Survives Scares to Lead Switzerland 2-0
